Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Lightning strike damage assessment. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 13/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
